description: Welcome to family-friendly living in Surrey’s desirable Wood & Water community, nestled in Fleetwood neighbourhood, with golf courses, restaurants & shops nearby. This beautiful townhouse features 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, a flex room, double garage, & a private balcony/deck. The lower level offers a spacious flex room with half bath, perfect for a home office or play area. The main flr boasts a chef’s kitchen that seamlessly flows into the dining & living areas, above height ceilings & direct access to a bright SW-facing large deck. Upstairs, enjoy a generous primary suite with an ensuite & walk-in closet, plus 2 more bedrooms & another full bath. Residents can also enjoy exclusive access to the community clubhouse gym, kids play area, games room and lounge.
